content.rendered:
Special Assets Assistant | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Admin Role to the Commercial Lender
  • Experience processing commercial loans
  • Familiar with process where loans go to collections
  • Extremely organized and professional
  • Excel & PowerPoint proficient
  • $18-$20/hr
